original_text: My God hath sent his angel, and hath shut the lions' mouths, that they have not hurt me: forasmuch as before him innocency was found in me; and also before thee, O king, have I done no hurt.
korean_text: 나의 하나님이 이미 그의 천사를 보내어 사자들의 입을 봉하셨으므로 사자들이 나를 상해하지 못하였사오니 이는 나의 무죄함이 그 앞에 명백함이오며 또 왕이여 나는 왕에게도 해를 끼치지 아니하였나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: My God hath sent his angel
and hath shut the lions' mouths
that they have not hurt me
forasmuch as before him innocency was found in me
and also before thee, O king
